alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Lenoir, northwestern Craven, southeastern Pitt and southwestern Beaufort Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roundtree, or near Ayden, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Washington, Winterville, Ayden, Grifton, Vanceboro, Shelmerdine, Calico, Black Jack, Fort Barnwell, Ormondsville, Wilmar, Graingers, Roundtree, Ernul, Chocowinity, Washington Park, Grimesland and Gardnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Greene; Lenoir; Northern Craven; Pitt
